Deprecated List

Member [CPTBarPlotDataSource-p barLabelForBarPlot:recordIndex:]
This method has been replaced by the dataLabelForPlot:recordIndex: (CPTPlotDataSource-p) method and is no longer used.

Member [CPTPieChartDataSource-p sliceLabelForPieChart:recordIndex:]
This method has been replaced by the dataLabelForPlot:recordIndex: (CPTPlotDataSource-p) method and is no longer used.

Member [CPTPlotDataSource-p recordIndexRangeForPlot:plotRange:]
This method is no longer used and will be removed from a later release.

Member CPTBarPlot::barLabelOffset
This property has been replaced by the CPTPlot::labelOffset property.

Member CPTBarPlot::barLabelTextStyle
This property has been replaced by the CPTPlot::labelTextStyle property.

Member CPTPieChart::sliceLabelOffset
This property has been replaced by the CPTPlot::labelOffset property.
